statements: DELETE FROM proteins WHERE protein_id = 1 AND study_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM proteins WHERE expression_level >= 5 AND protein_name = 'Beta-casein';
DELETE FROM BiopharmaceuticalDevelopment WHERE sample_id = 100 AND drug_name = 'Drug A';
DELETE FROM ProteinExpressionStudies WHERE protein_name = 'Protein X' AND expression_level < 0.5;
DELETE FROM Results WHERE significance = false;
DELETE FROM StudyParticipants WHERE participant_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM StudyResults WHERE result_id = 101 AND gene_id = 10;
